name: pdf-lib PDF マージ
description: pdf-lib で2つのPDFを結合（デモ）。

files.template:
const { PDFDocument } = require('pdf-lib');
(async () => { const a = await PDFDocument.create(); a.addPage(); const b = await PDFDocument.create(); b.addPage(); const out = await PDFDocument.create(); const [aBytes,bBytes] = [await a.save(), await b.save()]; const aDoc = await PDFDocument.load(aBytes); const bDoc = await PDFDocument.load(bBytes); const [aPage] = await out.copyPages(aDoc, [0]); const [bPage] = await out.copyPages(bDoc, [0]); out.addPage(aPage); out.addPage(bPage); const bytes = await out.save(); console.log('merged bytes', bytes.length); })();
